title: U.S. Treasury Bond Index

issues.title: Maturity range endpoint ambiguity
issues.description: 'between 1 and 10 years' - unclear if inclusive or exclusive of endpoints
issues.suggested_fix: Clarify: 'Maturities greater than or equal to 1 year and less than or equal to 10 years' or 'Maturities ≥1 year and ≤10 years'

issues.title: Market close time not specified
issues.description: 'market close' could be interpreted as Treasury market close or equity market close
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Market close defined as 15:00 ET (Treasury market close)' or '16:00 ET'

issues.title: Treatment of newly auctioned bonds unclear during month
issues.description: 'added at next rebalancing' but handling between auction and rebalancing not specified
issues.suggested_fix: Clarify: 'Newly auctioned bonds not included in index until next monthly rebalancing. No intra-month additions.'

notes: Minor clarifications needed - easily implementable with minimal changes
